cards.header: Uburyo bwiza bwo gutanga inkuru buhagaze kubigaragara canke bibaho kurusha iciyumviro, urusaku, canke inyungu zumuntu. Mbega iri shingiro ndarikoresha gute ahantu mukibano ca misi yose?

cards.text:
##Muri kino cigwa muzokwiga:
&ivyerekeye; Ibintu nshingiro vya raporo nziza
&ivyerekeye;Ingene wotandukanya ibintu ingene bimeze n'ivyiyumviro
&ivyerekeye; Ingene wokoresha ibintu ingene bimeze nk'icishimikizo ca raporo yawe

Ahantu hatuye abantu benshi kandi batandukanye, gutanga inkuru neza birashobora kumera nkibigoye. Biragorana kenshi na kenshi kumenya canke ikiranga neza abo bantu batanga izo nkuru. Inkuru yukuri canke igezweho ishobora kugora kwegeranya, ariko bimwe mubigaragara bikomeye bishobora gufasha guha umuco abantu kuvyerekeye ico kintu. Abamenyeshamakuru beza barakoresha imitima yabo n'ubwenge bwabo mukumenya abo kwizera. Barongera kandi bakitwararika neza iyinkuru ziva bakongera bakabwiza ukuri ababumviriza aho inkuru yavuye.

## Kwegeranya inkuru:
Igikoresho canke inkuru uko vyoba biri kose, Inkuru iteguwe neza itangura kwishura ibibazo nyamukuru bitandatu kuvyerekeye ico kintu:

• Inde?
• Iki?
• Hehe?
• Ryari?
&bull: Kuki?
• Gute?

Vyabibazo vyurufatiro bitanu bifasha abamenyeshamakuru kwegeranya ibintu bigaragara bikenewe mu gutegura inkuru. Gerageza uko bishoboka kuvuga ibikenewe kandi vyo; wibuke kurondera amazina yose kandi yukuri yabantu nahantu, wongere witwararike kumenya neza ingene yandikwa. Iyo uriko uratanga inkuru, menya neza ko uriko uregeranya inkuru ikenewe ifasha gutahura abanyagihugu bandi batazi ivyabaye. Nivyiza rero kugira itohoza muri kahise imbere yuko utangura gutegura inkuru. Abamenyeshamakuru beza baba bazi neza inkuru yivyo bariko bararondera. Ni vyiza cane ko inkuru utanze ijamwo umuco mwinshi. Kwandika ko inzego zumutekano zari zashitse ahariko habera imyiyerekano ni kimwe. Ariko kandi biratanga umuco cane kurusha iyuvuze ko zari zivuye mubushikiranganji bwohagati mugihugu, atari igisirikare muri rusangi. Birashobora kugora rero gutandukanya ikigaragara n'iciyumviro. Ugomba rero kwihoza ivyo wewe wibaza kuvyerekeye inkuru hama ukareka ubushobozi bwabakwumviriza bakagira iciyumviro bakoresheje ibihari bigaragara mu nkuru wabashikirije.
## Uburorero bwaya ma W atanu abajijwe kandi yishuwe neza:

### Habaye iki? 
Vuga mumajambo make kandi yumvikana ivyabaye. Havuyemwo iki? hari icononekaye? Ninde yatsinze? Hari n'umwe yapfuye? Tomora.
Neza: Abatora uno musi muri Tripoli bagiye mumatora ya demokarasi muri ico gihugu iryambere.
Nabi: Uno musi ni umusi woguhimbaza nk'uko igihugu cacu gikomeye cinjiye mukiringo gishasha kandi c'iterambere ryisununuye.

### Ni nde vyerekeye?
Sigura abari bahari. Mbega bangana gute? Bava mu mirwi iyahe canke amashirahamwe ayahe?
Neza: Abantu barenga amajana abiri bari bahashitse nababaserukira mwishirahamwe ryabakozi. 
Amashirahamwe nka Mouvement de Solidarite na King's Personal Stff bari bahashitse.
Nabi: Abanyagihugu benshi nabanyepolitike bari bahashitse.

### Vyabereye he?
Vuga igihugu, intara, igisagara, ahantu, ubudandaji, igorofa, etc. -- havuge muburyo bugaragara.
Kuvuga abantu begamiye imirwi ya politike, ubwoko bwabo bantu canke amadini yabo bishobora kuba nkenerwa canke ntibibe nkenerwa. Mbega aho hantu ni mugisagara? Ni hagati mugihugu? Ni ikibanza ca gisirikare?
Neza: Urwo rukino rwabereye kukibuga cumupira wamaguru cahora ar'icakaminuza inyuma ya port ya Said.
Nabi: Urukino ntirwabereye kuri stade dusanzwe tumenyereye.

### Vyatanguye ryari?
Tanga itariki yukuri -- umusi mu kwezi, ukwezi numwaka. Ikiringo cumwanya kuruwo musi bishobora kuba nkenerwa cane nko mu bihe bimwe bimwe vyihuta guhinduka. Nimba igihe mu mwaka gikenewe, canke nimba hari umusi wakaruhuko canke nimba ar'igihe co guhagarika imishamirano canke intambara, shiramwo iyo nkuru. Hoba hari kumurango canke mw'ijoro?
Neza: Ubwambere vyari vyateguwe kuba kw'itariki 6 zu kwezi kwa Ndamukiza, igiteramo ca Aman Halawa cungururijwe kwitariki 14 za Ndamukiza.
Nabi: Igiteramo cumuririnvyi rurangiranwa  cari categekanijwe kuba ejo hahise ariko cungururijwe ku ndwi iza.

###''Nikuki vyashitse?''
Niyahe mpavu yatumye bishika? Vyatanguye gute? Mwirinde gufatira muri menshi inkuru. Mufatire cane ku nkuru zihari zegeranijwe. Hari ikintu cari gihari catumye bishika canke cabaye intanduruko yavyo? Vyoba vyari vyarateguwe? Nimba arivyo, na nde? Ni nde yashizemwo uburyo kubwavyo? Ni nde yabiteguye?
Neza: Ikiraro nticari gushobora kurinda imikuba myishi yamazi hama kirarwa, vyavuzwe numuvugizi wigisirikare caba Ingenieurs.
Nabi:  Ikiraro cari gifashwe nabi cane bivuye kwiyonona ryuburyo bugirwa nintwaro, ninayo mpavu cahitanywe nimikuba yamazi.''

###''Vyashitse gute?''
Erekana neza urukurikirane rwivyabaye -- imwihwezo utandukanye cane niciyumviro. Vyakurikiranye gute? Vyoba vyatanguye buhorobuhoro canke vyashitse giturumbuka?mHoba hariho ikintu kigaragara catumye biba?
Neza: Abantu batanguye kuza kare cane biyegeranya, hama abashika amajana bari bamaze kwiyegeranya kumugoroba amaja yaho bita kuri place, baganira, berekana ibimenyetso bitandukanye bongera basaba ugutanga imihoho kumushikiranganji wamagara yabantu bivuye kurupfu rwashitse ku ndwi yahera kubana cumi nabatatu bahitanywe na n'urucanco rufise imigera rwa gripe.
Nabi: Abantu benshi bari bahashitse batera urwamo rutari ruke basaba ikimborwa ry'umushikiranganji wamagara yabantu, bamwagiriza urupfu rwabo bana.

##Ama Factoides
Iyo hatanzwe bikeya, ni vyiza rimwe na rimwe ko umuntu yiyumvira muburyo bwo kwegeranya ama factoides. Ama factoides ni bintu vyurufatiro kuri raporo zimeze neza. Ama factoides nama tidibits yinkuru nkenerwa kugira witwararike kwishura nkibibazo vyo kumenya umuntu, canke ikintu, igihe, nimpamvu yikintu mu buryo bwiza bushoboka.
• Ibiharuro canke ibitangura nama factoides: Bingana gute? Vyatanguye igihe ki?
• Umuco kukintu cose nama factoides. Erekana muburyo bucagaguye ingene --uko coba kiri kose-- gikora. Catanguye ryari? Ni ryari gishobora kugira ingaruka? Ni nde vyerekeye? Ni nde atabishigikiye? Ni nde abishigikiye?
• Imyihwezo nayo nyene nama factoides. Kwerekana neza uko ikintu kiri birakunzwe kutitabwaho ariko nubwoko budasanzwe bwa factoide. Mbega icumba kingana gute? Mbega yambay'iki? Scene niyahe?
• Ivyuvuze ukibuka iyo wabikuye navyonyene nama factoides: Iyo wakuye ivyuvuze birafatira mu menshi canke bigatandukanya iciyumviro cawe nabandi. Iyo wakuye inkuru bishobora kuba imvugo yibintu nkenerwa bisanzwe bibaho canke iciyumviro -- bivanye naho wakuye iyo nkuru. Yaba rero ari imvugo yikintu gisanzwe gihari canke iciyumviro, igisanzwe kibaho nico nkenerwa kumumenyesha makuru.

cards.header: Izindi nkuru ndende canke zikomeye zishobora gusaba gutangwa hakoreshejwe uburyo bundi butandukanye bwokuzirondera imbere canke inyuma yuko ikintu kiba.

cards.text:
## IBINTU VYO KWIBUKA

Utegerezwa kwibuka gutandukanya ibintu ingene bimeze n'ivyiyumviro.
Ishikwa n'umwanya n'intambanyi za raporo nziza
Ihengamiro ry'umuntu nayo ni intambamyi kur raporo nziza
Uragaba: ntuzohe inkuru mbi kubasomyi bawe
Ivyo vyose vyogabanuka uyaze n'abandi bamenyeshamakuru n'ukuraba ubwoko bw'inkuru n'inkomoko zayo zose.

cards.question: Nivyahe mubikurikira uburorero bwama ''factoides?'' ( Hashobora kuba hari inyishu zirenze imwe)
Nivyo canke Sivyo: Inde, iki, hehe, ryari, nigituma nibibazo bitandatu nyamukuru ugomba kugerageza kwishura iyo uriko uratanga inkuru.
